events.title: Dine Out Night at Threshold Brewing
events.description: Join us for a fun evening of food, drinks, and community! Threshold Brewing will donate 10% of all purchases back to Peapod. Bring your friends and family!
events.raffle: Check the #social channel for raffle details

events.title: Willamette Valley Pie Sale
events.description: Locally grown and handmade frozen pies and desserts. Order by 12/3, pickup on 12/19. The family with the most pie sales wins two passes to The Wiggle Room!
events.prize: Two Wiggle Room passes for top seller

events.title: Peacock Lane Cocoa & Cider Sale
events.description: Join us for hot cocoa and cider while enjoying the festive Peacock Lane holiday lights! Stop by for a warm beverage and support Pea Pod.

events.title: Chipotle Fundraiser Night
events.description: Order online or in-person and support Peapod! Mention Peapod or use the online code to have a portion of your purchase donated to our community.
events.benefit: Portion of purchases go to Peapod

events.title: Clothing Swap - Mini Fundraiser
events.description: Newborn to size 6 kids clothes. Pay what you want, suggested donation of $1 per piece. All proceeds directly support The Pea Pod Family Resource Center.

events.title: Pizza Night at Atlas Pizza
events.location: Atlas Pizza - 3570 SE Division St, Portland, OR
events.description: Join us for delicious pizza and support Pea Pod! Atlas Pizza will donate a portion of sales to our community. Bring your family and friends for a tasty evening!
events.benefit: Portion of purchases go to Peapod

events.title: Children's Book Swap - Mini Fundraiser
events.description: Bring your gently used children's books! Take home some fresh reads for your library. Pay what you want, suggested donation of $1 per book. All proceeds directly support The Pea Pod Family Resource Center.

events.title: Talent Show
events.subtitle: Fundraiser & Auction
events.description: Our biggest fundraising event of the year! Silent auction, raffle items, and community fun. Similar to the Halloween party with exciting auction items donated by our amazing community. Save the date and invite your friends and family!

products.title: Peapod Stickers
products.description: 2x3" durable vinyl stickers, perfect for water bottles or lunchboxes. Dishwasher safe!

products.title: Peapod T-Shirts
products.description: Show your Peapod pride with these awesome t-shirts!

auctionItems.title: 3 Night Stay in Bend, Oregon
auctionItems.description: Enjoy 3 nights in beautiful Bend, Oregon!

auctionItems.title: Private Swim Parties (2 available)
auctionItems.description: Two 2-hour private swim parties for up to 8 guests each. Perfect for a birthday or special celebration!

auctionItems.title: Short-Term Rental Stay (2+ nights)
auctionItems.description: A couple nights at a property from a short-term rental startup. Details to be finalized.

auctionItems.title: Idea Accelerator / Startup Crash Course
auctionItems.description: Have an idea or desire for something to exist? Get help making it real! Learn how to bring your idea into the world, or get a patient explanation of why it might be impossible (we try to break the laws of physics responsibly).

auctionItems.title: Haircuts, Beard Trims, or Face Shaves
auctionItems.description: Professional haircuts (mostly shorter cuts but can do long lengths), beard trims, or face shaves. Multiple services available.

auctionItems.title: Literacy Lady Birthday Package
auctionItems.description: Birthday party package from the Literacy Lady with storytelling, sensory fun, and music. As seen at Finn's Hammer & Jacks Birthday Party!

auctionItems.title: 6 Month FLIP Museum Membership for 2
auctionItems.description: 6-month membership for 2 people to the FLIP Museum!

suggestions.title: Kids' Art Projects
suggestions.description: Have all the kids make a special art project to auction off individually

suggestions.title: Handprint Bench or Chair
suggestions.description: Auction off a bench or chair with all of the kids' handprints

suggestions.title: Self-Care Basket
suggestions.description: Call around to get spa deals to make a self-care basket

suggestions.title: Big Ticket Raffle
suggestions.description: Raffle off a big ticket item (e.g., vacation for 2 to Mexico)

suggestions.title: Small Business Gift Cards
suggestions.description: Ask small businesses for gift card donations, especially those you have a strong relationship with. Nice to have some lower ticket items.

methods.note: Alternative payment method with lower fees coming soon

methods.instructions: Give checks directly to Max (Avery's dad) or put them in the lock box inside the playroom (behind the door on the left as you step inside)
methods.taxReceipt: Available upon request from Sarah or Max

contact.receipts: Ask Sarah or Max for tax-deductible receipt

committee.title: Auction Committee
committee.description: We need volunteers to help organize the February auction! If you're experienced with events like this or want to help by seeking donations, please reach out.
